  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.vm.directive.Literal
    Use the #[[unparsed content]]# syntax instead.
    net.sourceforge.pmd.testframework.StreamUtil
    Just use apache IOUtils
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    net.sourceforge.pmd.renderers.AbstractRenderer.propertyDefinitions
    net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.swift.antlr4.SwiftLexer.tokenNames

    Use SwiftParser.VOCABULARY instead.
